entityId.localType: State Records Office of Western Australia Reference code

nameEntry.part: State Records Office of Western Australia

biogHist.abstract: 'Files - Community Welfare ("A" Series) is a very large series of files on administrative matters relating to the welfare of children in out of home care in Western Australia from 1908 to 1990. It contains files created by the Public Charities and State Children's Department, the State Children's Department, the Child Welfare Department, the Department for Community Welfare and the Department for Community Services. Records in this series often name children and young people who came into contact with the Department or other agencies. Records also document actual and proposed policy and practice.
biogHist.p: Open, except for those files which are restricted for 75 or 100 years. The State Records Office will advise which files are open and how to apply to the Department for Child Protection and Family Support for access to closed files.

descriptiveNote.p: Files created by the Department for Community Services are held in this series at the State Records Office of WA.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Department for Child Protection and Family Support, State of Western Australia (2013 - 2017)

descriptiveNote.p: The Department for Child Protection and Family Support (DCPFS) controls access to the 'closed' files in this series, which is in the custody of the State Records Office of WA.
